data.eml:eml: Three new species of Indochinamon Yeo & Ng, 2007 (Crustacea: Brachyura: Potamoidea: Potamidae) from Vietnam, with a redescription of Ranguna (Ranguna) kimboiensis Dang, 1975

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Naruse, Tohru, Quynh, Nguyen Xuan, Yeo, Darren C. J. (2011): Three new species of Indochinamon Yeo & Ng, 2007 (Crustacea: Brachyura: Potamoidea: Potamidae) from Vietnam, with a redescription of Ranguna (Ranguna) kimboiensis Dang, 1975. Zootaxa 2732: 33-48, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.200924
